titleStmt.title: A just lamentation for the irrecoverable loss of the nation by the doleful death of the late Queen Mary of blessed memory delivered in a sermon preached at Daventry March 5, 1694/5 [i.e. 1695] / by Andrew Barnett.
titleStmt.author: Barnett, Andrew, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
